# Agree - Healthy Vegetarian Food Delivery App

Project created and configured successfully.

## Project Information
- **App Name**: Agree
- **Type**: React Native with Expo
- **Language**: JavaScript
- **Theme**: Healthy greens and natural colors

## Completed Features
✅ Expo project initialized
✅ React Navigation configured
✅ Splash screen with animation
✅ Home screen with popular products and categories
✅ Cart functionality
✅ Checkout screen with customer information form
✅ Healthy color theme applied

## How to Run
Use `npm run web` to start the development server for web.
Use `npm run android` or `npm run ios` to run on mobile devices.
